loans.name: José Joaquín

texts.es: José Joaquín, tiene la edad  de 40 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y sus hijos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, y semilla de frijol de buena calidad, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y en trabajos para la asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de de este cultivo. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jose Joaquin, 40, is married and lives with his wife and children, who are his main priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy fertilizers and other products to plant quality beans and insure they have have a good germination process.  He will also hire workers to apply the products and help with the planting activity to make sure the job is done well.  He wants to take advantage of the good climate and land in the area for this type of crop.  He also wants to put into practice the years of experience he has.  He will buy the best products so his plantation develops well to produce an abundant crop in the short term.

With the income from the crop Jose Joaquin hopes to be able to give his family a comfortable lifestyle and an education, as well as be able to meet family goals and continue investing in his crops.  This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has never had a state bank loan and FUDECOSUR is giving him a loan with better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To plant beans.

loans.name: Epefania

texts.en:
Epefania is 54 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like soap, milk, sugar, shampoo, etc.

Epefania has been in this business for two years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like soap, milk, sugar, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 65 years old and married with seven children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Anita is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to pay labor costs for harvesting rice and land preparation.

Anita has been farming rice for 20 years and earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to pay labor fees for harvesting rice and land preparations

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos , un hombre emprendedor , tiene 30 años de edad, es soltero y vive con los padres actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Carlos, an entrepreneurial man, is 30 years old. He is single and currently lives with his parents. He requested a loan with the goal of purchasing supplies such as fertilizers and fumigants. This will help out his coffee crop, which he hopes to maintain in good condition as the plants develop. He wants to get a quality product from these plants. 
The only limitation Carlos has is a lack of money to continue growing. His depends on this business to get ahead, and for this reason he has requested a loan. This is the first loan he has gotten from FUDECOSUR. He does not have any other loans with state banks, but it has been easier to get a loan through FUDECOSUR, and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as fertilizers and fumigant.

loans.name: Sean's Group

texts.en: Sean is 23 years old and a mother of one kid. Her main source of income is from two hectares of rice cropping and one hectare of cassava. This business that she has been involved with for five years earns about 26,700 KHR per day. Sean is a first-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She teamed up as a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to pay for plowing fees and to buy fertilizer for her crop. She strongly believes that she can gain a good yield that is better than before.

loans.use: To pay for plowing fees and to buy fertilizer for her crop

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Chory's Group

texts.en: Chory is 39 years old and a resident of Bovel district of Battambang province where her two hectares of cassava are grown. Besides this agribusiness, she spends her time working for others for a fee. Chory has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before. Now, she forms a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy insecticide and to pay for labor costs plus the plowing fee. She strongly hopes that she can gain a good yield with a good income.

loans.use: to buy insecticide and to pay for labor costs plus the plowing fee

loans.name: Gina

texts.es: Gina, tiene la edad  de 37 años, está en unión libre,  vive con su esposo y sus hijos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, y semilla de frijol de una variedad que pueda tener una mejor producción y con buena sanidad, además pagar mano de obra  en trabajos d preparación del terreno y en la aplicación de los productos y la asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo del cultivo de frijol. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gina, 37, lives with her common-law husband and children, who are her priority.  She plans to use the loan to buy fertilizers and other products to plant beans and insure a good germination process.  The variety she is planting will producer a better, healthier crop.  She will also hire workers to prepare the land, apply the products and help with planting.  This way she can be sure a good job is done.

Gina wants to take advantage of the good climate and land in the area for this type of crop.  She also wants to put into practice the years of experience she has growing beans.  She will buy the best quality products so her crop will grow well and produce an abundant crop at harvest time.

With the income from the harvest she hopes to be able to provide her family with a comfortable lifestyle and an education.  She also wants to meet family goals and continue investing in her crop.  This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has never had a state bank loan and FUDECOSUR is giving her better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To plant beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a photocopier and stock for upcoming holidays.

loans.name: Moeurt's Group

texts.en:
A local villager from Bovel district of Battambang province, where her business is run, Moeurt is 50 years old and a mother of one kid. Her main sources of income are from rice farming, pig-raising, dessert selling, and her paid job during her spare time. It is the business that she has had since she was 25 years old.  

For this loan cycle, she forms a group of two to get a loan of 200,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) each. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy household appliances for her family such as dishes, pots, etc. She hopes this micro loan will fulfill the need in her household.

loans.use: To buy household appliances for her family

loans.name: Marcelino Luis

texts.es:
Marcelino tiene 41 años de edad, es un hombre emprendedor y trabajador que vive en el Distrito de Huarmey con su esposa e hija.
Ha luchado mucho para sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su nivel de vida.
Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la compra y venta de animales de consumo, siendo un exitoso empresario debido a la cantidad de clientes que tiene y al precio competitivo al cual ofrece sus productos.
Pero este hombre ejemplar no se da por vencido con ese trabajo. Desde hace 2 labora en el campo de espárragos desempeñándose como Cortador, obteniendo de esta manera un ingreso adicional.
Marcelino estará eternamente agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá remodelar y reforzar su casa para poder proteger a su familia durante la temporada de lluvia, de esta manera sentirá mayor comodidad en su hogar y brindará mayor seguridad a su familia, y más adelante podrá cumplir su gran sueño: “Tener su propio carro”
texts.en:
Marcelino, 41, is an entrepreneurial man and worker who lives in the District of Huarmey with his wife and daughter.
He has fought to make his family’s life better and improve their quality of life. 
For the last three years he has worked buying and selling animals intended for consumption, which has been successful due to the amount of customers that he has and the competitive prices that Marcelino offers his products. 
But this exemplary man does not just stop at this job. For the last two years he has worked in the asparagus fields as a cutter, in this way generating an additional source of income. 
Marcelina would be eternally grateful for the Kiva loans, as with the help that the loans would give him, he could remodel and reinforce his house in order to protect his family during the rainy season. With this, he would feel much more comfortable in his home and would provide greater security to his family. In the future he could accomplish his greatest dream: “to have his own car.”

loans.use: to remodel his home for the rainy season.

loans.name: Koleti

texts.en: Koleti is 22 years old and married with two children. She runs a small business selling a variety of snacks in her community and has been doing this for four years. Koleti has requested a loan to buy a toaster, eggs, sliced bread, butter, jam, plastic bags, foam cups and a new sandwich maker. She joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Koleti will expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a toaster, eggs, sliced bread, butter, jam, plastic bags, foam cups and a new sandwich maker

loans.name: Ramie

texts.en:
Ramie is 53 years old and married with seven children, two of whom are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Ramie has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from direct selling Avon products.

Ramie aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is 51 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like liqueur, canned goods, eggs, noodles, spices, etc.

Juanita has borrowed and paid back five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from selling rice.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like liqueur, canned goods, eggs, noodles, spices, etc

loans.name: Estilita

texts.en:
Estilita is 51 years old with four children, one of whom is in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Estilita has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Este es Jorge, un joven de 23 años con una mente emprendedora y con buenas ideas. El se dedica hace 6 años a la fabricación y comercialización de arepas caseras y hechas en leña en el municipio de Bello, Antioquia.
Trabaja todos los días desde las 4:00 Am hasta las 4:00 Pm buscando generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su pequeña hija.
El trabaja en compañía de su esposa que se ha convertido en un gran apoyo para él.
El crédito solicitado lo invertirá en la construcción de varias chimeneas y fugas para que el humo de la leña que asa las arepas pueda salir fácilmente.
Este apoyo podrá darle la oportunidad de trabajar más cómodamente y sin tener el riesgo de enfermar de los pulmones.
Este apoyo impactara favorablemente su negocio y su vida familiar.
texts.en:
This is Jorge, a young man (23 years old) with an entrepreneurial mind and good ideas. For the past six years, in the municipality of Bello in the department of Antioquia, he has prepared and sold homemade arepas, made in a wood-fired oven. He works seven days a week, from 4 a.m. until 4 p.m., trying to generate enough income to provide for his young daughter. He works with his wife, who has become a great support for him.

Jorge will invest the requested loan into the construction of a variety of ovens and vents, so that the smoke from the firewood which cooks the arepas can easily escape. This support will give Jorge the opportunity to work more comfortably and without risking his lungs. This support will have a positive impact on his business and his family life.

loans.use: to construct ovens for his business.

loans.name: Olga Lucia

texts.es:
Esta es la historia de Olga, una mujer que estuvo dedicada durante gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos y de su hogar. Siempre se desempeño como ama de casa sin renegar y haciéndolo todo con amor.
Desde hace 7 años decidió iniciar con un negocio de venta de accesorios y variedades en su propia casa con el afán de buscar ingresos para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. En el negocio vende productos de belleza por catalogo al por menor y por pedido.
Ella hoy en día es una empresaria con muchas ganas de progresar y por eso solicita un crédito para comprar un amplio surtido de jeans de hombre para agregarle más variedad a su oferta, de este modo podrá atraer más clientes y se dará la oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos familiares.
Ella sueña con tener un gran almacén con varios empleados.
texts.en:
This is the story of Olga, a woman who dedicates a large part of her life to caring for her children and the home.  She always goes about her household chores without complaining, doing everything with love.

In an effort to earn an income to give her children a better quality of life, seven years ago Olga started a business selling accessories and other items from home.  She sells beauty products by catalogue, both retail and on an order basis.  Now she is an entrepreneur who is determined to prosper, so she is requesting a loan to buy a wide variety of men's jeans to add to her products.  This will attract more customers and allow her to earn more income for the family.

Her dream is to have a large store with several employees.

loans.use: To buy a variety of men's jeans to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a portable oven and primary ingredients

loans.name: Raul Antonio

texts.es: Raúl es un hombre polifacético el cual como principal cualidad que tiene es que para ser empela en diferentes campos para rebuscar capital para su hogar, uno de los negocios más próspero y rentable para el señor Raúl es la distribución de naranjas las cuales tuvo que suspender por tomar un contrato muy jugoso y beneficio para su familia. Una vez terminado tal contrato se encuentra en su casa y quiere activarse laboralmente por ende solicita un crédito parta la compra de bultos de naranja y reparación de motocicleta que es su principal medio de transporte y con la que le distribuye a sus clientes. Su principal objetivo con el crédito es seguir manteniendo a su familia rebuscándose el sustento diario para ellos. Su principal sueño es mantener a su familia en buenas condiciones tanto económicas como saludables.
texts.en: Raul is a versatile man whose main characteristic is that he works in different fields to bring in income for his household. One of his most prosperous and profitable businesses is the distribution of oranges, which he had to put on hold in order to take a very juicy contract that was beneficial for his family. Once finished with the contract, he finds himself in his house and he wants to get back to working. For this reason he is asking for a loan to buy oranges in bulk and repair his motorcycle, which is his primary mode of transportation and what he uses to distribute oranges to his customers. His main goal with the loan is to continue to take care of his family by covering their daily necessities. His grand dream is to assure that his family in is in both good economical and healthy conditions.

loans.use: to buy oranges in bulk and repair his motorcycle in order to distribute his products to the entire area.

loans.name: Julita

texts.en:
Julita is 58 years old and a widow with four children.  With two children in school, Julita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Julita has been in this business for one year. 

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, and sugar

loans.name: Marieta

texts.en:
Marieta works hard to support her family. She is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like rice, sugar, milk, butter, etc.

Marieta has been in this business for 12 years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like rice, sugar, milk, butter, etc

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Melinda works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of vegetables business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her restaurant.  Melinda is borrowing PHP 5,500 through NWTF to purchase more stock of vegetables to sell. 

Melinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Michelle

texts.en:
Michelle is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell of fruit business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of fruit to sell. 

Michelle has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from buying and selling charcoal.

Michelle has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of fruit to sell

loans.name: José Emilio

texts.es:
José de 49 años de edad, solo estudio primer grado, tiene dos hijos, pero ya no viven con él, porque trabajan.

José se dedica desde hace muchos años a la agricultura y ganadería, nadie más se involucra a estas actividades.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar ganado, abono y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz. 

El sueño de José es contar siempre con el apoyo de credicampo, para obtener sus créditos y así mejorar su cultivo de maíz y tener ingresos  para mejorar su calidad de vida .
texts.en: José is 49 years old and only has a first-grade education. He has two children, but they don't live with him any more because they're working. José has made a living for many years in farming and livestock; there is no one who is more involved in these activities. He is requesting the loan from Kiva partner CrediCampo to purchase livestock as well as manure and fertilizer to grow corn. His dream is to always count on the support of CrediCampo to continue obtaining loans so he can improve his crops and increase his income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase livestock as well as manure and fertilizers to grow corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to tend to her coffee plants.

loans.name: Diego Fernando

texts.es:
El señor diego es un hombre emprendedor, estudioso y aplicado, desde hace 2 años comenzó con una legumbreria que hasta ahora le ha dado muy buenos resultados. El vive en el municipio de Bello, Antioquia con su madre a la cual manifiesta que tiene mucho que agradecerle en la vida.
El trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 5:00 Pm atendiendo un número de cliente medianamente alto.
El solicita un préstamo para comprar productos a granel como arroz, frijol, lentejas, entre otros y de éste modo satisfacer los deseos de los clientes que le piden estos productos.
Esta ayuda le permitirá inyectar variedad a su negocio y le brindara la jugosa oportunidad de mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos familiares.
texts.en: Diego is an enterprising and studious man who applies himself. Two years ago he started selling legumes and up until now it has had good results. He lives in the municipality of Bello with his mother, for whom he is very grateful. Diego works from Monday to Saturday from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m., serving a moderately high number of customers. He is requesting a loan to purchase products in bulk, such as rice, beans and lentils, and in this way meet the demands of his customers who are requesting these products. This will help him add variety to his business and allow him the opportunity to improve his sales and his household income.

loans.use: to purchase food, such as rice and beans, in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to her home (roof, windows, etc.)

loans.name: Zoraida Noemi

texts.es:
Zoraida es una joven emprendedora, con 25 años de edad, vive en Huarmey junto a sus padres.
Actualmente se dedica al negocio de venta de jugos, y le va muy bien porque es una persona muy amable, responsable y trabajadora y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de la mejor calidad y a un precio cómodo.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, por eso trabaja tenazmente para poder lograrlo.
Zoraida está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que con la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá ampliar su negocio comprando mayor volumen de mercadería, incrementando de este modo la cantidad de atención y en poco tiempo llegará a cumplir su más grande sueño: “Hacer crecer su negocio”.
texts.en:
Zoraida is a young entrepreneur who is 25 and lives in Huarmey, Peru with her parents. She currently makes a living selling juices, and she does very well because she is friendly, responsible and hardworking, and principally because she offers good quality products at a reasonable price. She is someone with a great desire to get ahead in life, and she works with tenacity to achieve this.

Zoraida is grateful to Kiva lenders because with the help they offer she will be able to expand her business by purchasing more merchandise, and thereby also expand what she can offer to her customers. Soon she will be able to make her biggest dream come true: to grow her business.

loans.use: buy more merchandise to expand her offerings to customers.

loans.name: Luis David

texts.es: Luis David, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero,  vive con sus padres y hermanos los cuales su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de semilla de frijol y fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra y así que tenga una buena geminación, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Luis David is 20 years old and single.  He lives with his parents and his brothers who are his biggest priority.  With this loan, he intends to buy bean seeds, fertilizer, and other products to use during sowing time so that his seeds can germinate well.  He also wants to pay for labor for the application of the products and assistance in planting seedlings once they have developed to assure that that job is done well.  

He wants to take advantage of the good climatic and soil conditions of the area, which is in the appropriate zone for growing this crop, and also to put his several years of experience handling staple grains into practice.  He also hopes to buy the best quality products so that his farm will be healthy and well developed in addition to providing a good crop and producing well in the short term.

He wants to use the profits from the harvest that he hopes to get for the well-being and education of his family and to accomplish some family goals and continue investing more in his crops.  This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  Prior to this, he has not had any loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR provided him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to plant beans

loans.name: Yasnery

texts.es: Yasnery una madre responsable una típica luchadora que da su propia vida pro su hijo y que hace hasta lo imposible para que este siempre este sonriente y alegre (el hijo lo podemos apreciar en la foto). En busca de un trabajo para ganar recursos y sostener su hogar se le presenta la oportunidad de trabajar con productos de la marca Amway, un empleo que según un amigo quien la aconsejo que vendiera estos productos es muy rentable y la principal ventaja es que contara con la ayuda del mejor ayudante del mundo su pequeño hijo de un año el cual tendrá a su lado siempre y podrá educarlo y criarlo pues su trabajo se lo permitirá. Yasnery se siente muy entusiasmada por el crédito pues lograra tener independencia económica y a su amado hijo cerca
texts.en:
Yasnery is a responsible mother. She is a fighter, who would give her life for her son and would do even the impossible so that he is always smiling and happy (he is with her in the picture). She has been looking for a job to make enough to sustain her family. She has now the opportunity to sell Amway products. According to a friend who recommended this activity, it is very profitable. The main advantage is that she will have the best “assistant” in the world: her son. He will be by her side always and she will be able to raise him and educate him better because of this job.

Yasnery is enthusiastic about this loan because she will be more independent financially and will have her beloved son by her side.

loans.use: to buy Amway products and start her own distribution business so that she can spend more time with her one-year-old son.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to enlarge her parking lot to be able to accommodate more cars.

loans.name: Estela Del Carmen

texts.es: Estela tiene  66 años, ha vivido toda su vida en la comunidad de los chinamos, es una persona sociable, honesta y trabajadora ella  ha sido padre y madre para sus 2 hijos ya que no contó con  el apoyo del padre de sus hijos, para subsistir y poder sacar adelante a sus hijos a trabajado fuerte en un pequeño  negocio de pulpería que lo tiene desde hace 30 años dice que gracias a Dios le ha ido muy bien y eso le ha permitido poder invertir más en el negocio   En esta comunidad no hay energía eléctrica, en su casa  tiene un sistema solar el cual solo ilumina su casa, ella para  vender sodas o productos que requieran bajas temperatura   compra hielo y lo guarda en un termo  e introduce productos bebibles para que se congelen un poco y así vender a los clientes. Ella necesita este crédito para comprar un sistema de refrigeración solar el cual le ayudara a incrementar sus ventas y se beneficiara al prosperar su negocio.
texts.en:
Estela is 66 years old and has lived in the community of Los Chinamos for her whole life. She is a sociable, honest and hard-working person who has played both mother and father to her two children because she didn't get support from their father. In order to get by and to help her children to get ahead, she has worked very hard at her small convenience store business. She has had this business for 30 years. She says that it has gone very well thanks to God, and this has allowed her to invest more in her business.

In her community, there is no electricity. Estela has a solar panel system in her home which only serves to light the house. In order to sell sodas or other items that need cold temperatures she buys ice and keeps it in a cooler. Then she adds beverages to the cooler so that they get colder so that she can sell them to her customers. She needs this loan in order to buy a solar refrigeration system that will help her to grow her sales and make her business more prosperous.

loans.use: to buy a solar refrigeration system.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy computers, mouses, etc.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Porfirio de 57 años de edad,  estudio hasta 4 grado de educación básica, él es casado con su esposa tienen 5 hijos, su esposa se dedica al trabajo de oficios domésticos, 2 hijos estudian y 2 trabajan la agricultura, y el otro vive a parte.  

Él se dedica al trabajo de albañil desde hace 10 años, así es  como él, les da el sustento diario a su familia de alimentación, salud, vestuario a sus hijos, además de realizar este trabajo, se dedica a la agricultura ya que este trabajo de la albañilería es por temporadas, por lo tanto el hace su milpa en la cual también se involucran sus hijos a ayudarle.  él tiene 15 años de experiencia de trabajar en la agricultura.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar 5  sacos de fertilizantes, 2 bolsas de semilla de maíz de alta calidad para obtener más rendimiento y alquiler del terreno en donde cultivara.   

A futuro cuando obtenga su cosecha de maíz,  pretende tener el maíz necesario  para poder la alimentación necesaria a sus hijos, a parte de la prioridad de alimentar a sus hijos, el resto de la cosecha que le sobra la venderá.
texts.en:
Porfirio is 57 years old. He completed the 4th grade of primary school, is married to his wife and has 5 children. His wife takes care of the household chores. Two children are at school and two work in farming, the other one does not live with them.

Porfirio has worked as a mason for ten years and he is the one who provides the family with what they need, like food, healthcare, and clothing for his children. In addition to this, he works in farming because masonry is seasonal work. Therefore he has his cornfield in which his children also work to help him. He has 15 years of experience in farming.

The loan he asks for from CREDICAMPO will be used to buy 5 sacks of fertilizers, 2 bags of corn seeds of a high quality to obtain a good return, and to pay for the lease of the plot for his crop.

In the future, when he can harvest the corn, he will have the corn he needs for his children and – apart from the first priority of feeding his children – he will be able to sell the part of the harvest he can spare.

loans.use: to buy 5 sacks of fertilizers, 2 bags of high quality corn seeds to get a good return, and to pay for the lease of his plot.

loans.name: Limberth Americo

texts.es: El señor Limberth, tiene 32 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su madre y cuatro hermanos todavía menores en edad escolar, en la localidad de vinto. Con su mamá hace dos años emprendió un negocio de venta de comidas al medio día, y venta de pollos por la noche, alquilan un espacio sobre una avenida principal en vinto y atienden el local, venden comida todos los días de la semana a trabajadores de la zona, personas y vecinos.  El señor también trabaja como mano de obra en una empresa empaquetando productos en cajas, tiene diferentes turnos en el mes, trabaja cada quince días intercalando mañanas, tardes y noches y eso le facilita para poder trabajar en la pensión, ahora solicita un crédito para la compra de una cocina y ollas, de esta forma obtendrá mayores ingresos, él  es un gran apoyo para su madre que tiene que pagar el estudio de cuatro hijos menores porque su padre se fue de su hogar hace 12 años y no saben nada de él desde entonces.
texts.en:
Señor Limberth is 32 years old and single. He lives in the community of Vinto with his mother and four siblings who are all still under the age of majority and attending school. He started a business with his mother two years ago selling meals at lunchtime and chickens at night. They rent a space on a main avenue in Vinto and they staff the shop themselves. They sell food every day of the week to workers in the area, other customers, and neighbours. Limberth also does manual labour at a business that packages products into boxes. He has different shifts throughout the month, working every 15 days. He alternates between mornings, afternoons and nights, which facilitates his work at the shop.

Limberth is requesting a loan in order to purchase a stove and pots. This will allow him to make better revenues. Limberth is a great support for his mother who has to pay for the education of her four children, since Limberth's father left home 12 years ago and no one has heard from him since.

loans.use: to purchase a stove and pots.

loans.name: Víctor Feliciano

texts.es:
Victor de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado. Actualmente,  está casado con su esposa han procreado tres hijos de 10, 7 y 1 años de edad, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos dos de sus hijos van a la escuela y solo el más pequeñito se queda con ella. Victor es agricultor en pequeño pero también hace otros trabajos para ganar dinero extra. 

Victor se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, lo aprendió de un señor al cual él le ayudaba antes cuando el señor lo llevaba a que le fuera ayudar a halar agua. él dice que lo veía como hacia el trabajo y así poco a poco, fue aprendiendo este trabajo hasta que un día decidió sembrar un pedacito para él y fue así como aprendió y hoy por hoy es de lo que él vive, el terreno donde cultiva le queda a unos 10 minutos de su casa y viaja en una bicicleta que tiene. Su horario es rotativo días va por la tarde de las 2 a las 5 y normalmente lo hace de 6:00am hasta las 11.30 am.

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar tres sacos de abono, dos sacos de fórmula, veneno y un litro de paracuac que este último sirve para combatir la plaga cuando están sembrando, y pues tiene que guardar una parte de dinero, ya que en el transcurso del desarrollo del maíz y del frijol siempre necesitan estarles poniendo otro tipo de fertilizantes. De esta forma estará preparando para iniciar con la siembra.

Sueña con tener primero lo más necesario para la familia, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida, el préstamo le ayudara en satisfacer la necesidad de la siembra de los granos básicos.
texts.en:
Victor, age 33, studied until the third grade. He is currently married, and along with his wife, they now have three children, ages 10, 7, and 1. She dedicates to the domestic tasks. Two of their children go to school and the youngest stays at home with her. Victor is a small farmer, but he does other jobs to gain some extra money.

Victor has been a farmer for the past ten years. He learned it from a man who he used to help to carry some water. Victor says that he used to watch this man and how he did the job, and that’s how he learned. One day he decided to sow a small piece of land for himself. Little by little he kept learning about the job, and he now lives from that piece of land. 

The land that he cultivates is located ten minutes away from his house, and he uses a bike to come and go. His schedule depends on the day. Sometimes he goes on the afternoon from 2:00 pm to 5:00 pm, and normally he goes from 6:00 am to 11:30 am.

He will use this loan to buy three bags of manure, two bags of certain type of fertilizer, poison and one liter of “paracuac”. This last one is used against plagues during the sowing. He also has to save part of the money, because during the development of corn and beans, he always needs to keep putting another type of fertilizers. All of this will allow him to begin the sowing. 

He dreams with fulfilling his family needs, and for that he hopes to keep working as long as God gives him health and life. The loan will help him to achieve the cultivation of staple grains.

loans.use: to buy three bags of manure, two bags of certain type of fertilizer, poison and one liter of paracuac (used for plagues while sowing).

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita works hard to support her family. Nenita is single and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Nenita has been in this business for 29 years now.

In the future, Nenita would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rufina is 46 years old and has three children who are in school.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Rufina requested a 6000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Rufina has been in this business for 1 year. In the future, Rufina would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Angelie

texts.en:
Angelie is 21 years old and single.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional canned goods, egg, milk, soap, and other items to sell. 

Angelie has borrowed and paid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from making candy. 

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, egg, milk, soap,and other items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy furniture for his home.

loans.name: Silvia Vanessa

texts.es:
Silvia de 25 años de edad, estudia bachillerato los fines de semana a distancia.  Esta acompañada, se dedica a cuidar unas vacas y actividades agrícolas. Ella vive con su compañero de vida en la casa de la abuela de su pareja. 

Silvia actualmente cuida unos cerdos esto lo hace desde unos meses y resulta una buena actividad que pueda realizarse mientras estudia y cuidad su familia.

El préstamo sera para construir un corral para los cerdos y espera comprar unos 4 más y una ternera para aprovechar los pastos de la época de lluvia, esto le va generar y mejorar ingresos cuando realice ventas, espera culminar sus estudios y tal vez tener un trabajo formal, su hijo va creciendo y va a la escuela y cada vez los gastos son más.
texts.en:
Silvia is 25 years old.  She studies for her baccalaureate on the weekends through distance learning.  She is married and works raising cows and doing agricultural work.  She lives with her partner in her partner's grandmother's house.  Silvia currently cares for some pigs, which she has done for some months, and it has turned out to be a good job for her to do while she studies and cares for her family.

The loan will be for building pig pen and she hopes to buy four more pigs and a calf to take advantage of the grasslands in the rainy season.  This will generate higher profits.  When she makes the sales, she hopes to complete her studies and maybe to have a formal career.  Her child is growing and going to school and each time the costs are increasing.

loans.use: to build a pig pen and to try to buy four more pigs and a calf to take advantage of the grasslands in the rainy season.

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
Martin de  51 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, su esposa realiza oficios domésticos,  tienen 7 hijos dos van a la escuela los otros trabajan y los mayores están acompañados, con ellos vive su suegra.

Martin trabaja la agricultura en la siembra de maíz y frijol principalmente siembra sorgo,  también porque tienen una yunta de terneros y quiere comprar otros, este último es para forraje trabaja en terrenos alquilados a 1 km de su casa.

 El préstamo será invertido en la compra de una yunta de novillos y la compra de herbicidas y fertilizantes para la producción de 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz y 3,500 de frijol.
texts.en:
Martin, 51, finished primary school. His wife provides domestic duties. They have seven children; two go to school and the others have partners. His mother-in-law lives with them.

Martin is primarily a corn and bean farmer, but also cultivates sorghum.

They have two yoked calves and want to buy more. They want to buy them for foraging. He works on rented land at 1Km from his home.

He'll invest the loan in buying a team of cattle for yoking, and herbicides and fertilizers to cultivate 10,500 square meters of corn and 3,500 of beans.

loans.use: buy a team of cattle for yoking, and herbicides and fertilizers to cultivate 10,500 square meters of corn and 3,500 of beans.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Trinidad works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from candy making.  Trinidad is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to  buy more items to sell such as shampoo, soap, spices and canned goods for her general store business.

Trinidad has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as shampoo, soap, spices and canned goods

loans.name: Lenie

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Lenie works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle repair shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready-to-wear clothing.  Lenie is borrowing 19,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to purchase additional spare parts and other materials  for her motorcycle repair shop business.

Lenie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional spare parts and other materials for her business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn works hard to support her family. Marilyn is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a 13,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase fishing net and other fishing materials.

Marilyn has been in this business for eight years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing net and other fishing materials

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 38 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like soap, eggs, sugar, canned goods, etc.

Merly has borrowed and paid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like soap, eggs, sugar, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is 45 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school. Gilda works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy more household goods to sell like canned goods, eggs, soap, etc.

Gilda has been in this business for eight years.

In the future Gilda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more household goods to sell like canned goods, eggs, soap, etc.

loans.name: Remideus

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Remideus works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling livestock.  Remideus is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell for her business.

Remideus has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 40 years old and married. With three children who are in school, Merly  works very hard to provide for them.

She  runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, noodles, etc.

Merly  has been in this business for 8 years. 

In the future Merly  would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, noodles, etc

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 51 years old and a widow with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Teresita's business and family home was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Teresita  has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

She has taken a PHP 5,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home. She is using the this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Teresita is committed to rebuild her devastated life and in future would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Gwendolyn

texts.en:
Gwendolyn is 34 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Gwendolyn's business and family home was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Gwendolyn has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Gwendolyn has taken a PHP 9620 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Gwendolyn is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in future would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 50 years old and has four children. Marilou is married and has two children who are in school.

She and her family survived Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Marilou is taking out a housing loan amounting to 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Marilou has been an NWTF borrower since 2012. She plans to recover through her general store.

With your help, Marilou can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of Super Typhoon Haiyan. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Ann Catherine

texts.en:
Ann Catherine works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by Super Typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her business and is now requesting a 6,620 PHP (Philippines pesos) housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she could build a house for her family.

With your help Ann Catherine will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is 45 years old and married with five children, four of whom are in school. Gilda works very hard to provide for them.

Gilda's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Gilda has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Gilda has taken a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using the this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Gilda is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in the future, would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Helen is 52 years old and has two children who are in school.

Helen has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Helen requested a 6,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional fish to sell.

Helen has been in this business for 25 years. In the future, Helen would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Seriza

texts.en:
Seriza works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by Super Typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her business and is now requesting a 9,460 PHP (Philippines pesos) housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she could build a house for her family.

With your help, Seriza will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en:
Virgie is 42 years old and married with seven children. With four children in school, Virgie works very hard to provide for them.

Virgie's business and family home were destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Virgie has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Virgie has taken a 9,500 PHP (Philippines pesos) housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Virgie is committed to rebuilding her devastated life, and in the future, would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda works hard to support her family. Belinda is married and has a dried fish business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish to dry and sell.

Belinda has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Belinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to dry and sell

loans.name: Ligia Margarita

texts.es:
Ligia de 30 años de edad, estudio bachillerato general y estudio un curso de estilismo, es madre soltera tiene dos hijos, solo uno asiste a la escuela tienen su casa en la propiedad de su mamá.

El negocio de Ligia consiste en la venta de pupusas, panes,  hot dog y hamburguesas en el parque municipal y hace trabajos de peinados y maquillajes a clientes locales, el cafetín en donde vende le queda cerca de su casa. 

 El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar panes, salsas, verduras, embutidos, maíz e ingredientes para las pupusas.  Con el objetivo de increentar las ventas y obtener mayores ingresos. Ella espera que su negocio sea estable y le genere seguridad económica para que sus hijos vayan a la escuela.
texts.en:
Ligia, 30, finished highschool and took a beauty styling course. She's a single mother of two, only one goes to school. They live in a house on her mother's property.

Ligia's business is selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas), bread, hot dogs and hamburgers in the municipal park, and she also provides hair and makeup services to local clients. She sells in a little cafe near her home.

The loan she is requesting is to buy bread, sauce, vegetables, charcuterie, corn and ingredients to make pupusas (stuffed tortillas), with the objective to increase sales and make more income. She hopes her business will be stabe and generate economic security so her children can go to school.

loans.use: buy bread, sauces, vegetables, charcuterie, corn and ingredients for pupusas (stuffed tortillas).

loans.name: Fuarosa

texts.en:
Fuarosa is a 44-year-old married woman with nine children. She has a small lawn mowing business to earn a living. She has five years of experience with this business. 

Fuarosa needs a loan to buy a new lawn mower, gasoline, spark plugs, engine oil and fuel stabilizer. She will use her profits to pay for her children's education. 

Fuarosa joined SPBD in 2009 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy a new lawn mower, gasoline, spark plugs, engine oil and fuel stabilizer

loans.name: Tele

texts.en:
Tele is a 27-year-old unwed woman with no children. She has a small plantation where she grows taro and bananas that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years. 

Tele needs a loan to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a tiller, new gloves and a spade. She has been a member of SPBD since 2014. Tele will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a tiller, new gloves and a spade

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 44 years old, married and has four children, three of whom are in school. She and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013, but her business and family home was wiped out. 

Vivian  is taking out a housing loan amounting to Php 5,000 purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Vivian has been an NWTF borrower since 2011. She plans to recover through her rice farming.

With your help, Vivian can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In future she  would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn works hard to support her family. On November 8, 2013, her business and home were wiped out by super typhoon Haiyan.

She has restarted her business and is now requesting a PHP 10,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor so she could build a house for her family.

With your help she will be able to rebuild her devastated life sooner.

In the future, Jovelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Felicidad

texts.en:
Felicidad is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling spices in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 5000 through NWTF to purchase additional spices to sell.

Felicidad has been in this business for 10 years. Felicidad also earns more income from buying and selling dried coconut meat.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Felicidad has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional spices to sell

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a 46-year-old male who is married with nine children. Only four of his children go to school. He is living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a farmer who has been in practice for 15 years, which has helped him to cater for the standard of living of his family and meet his daily expenses. He dreams of expanding his farming by buying a big piece of land that will yield more cocoa. He is challenged by harsh weather changes.

Wilson needs the loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: To buy cocoa to sell

loans.name: Chea

texts.en:
Chea, 53, lives with her husband and seven children in a village of Battambang province’s Moung Russey district, Cambodia. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice and growing sesame for almost 15 years. She can earn about 80,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day.

Chea is a first-cycle loan client with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 KHR to buy fertilizers for her rice paddy. With this loan, she hopes to increase her family’s income so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her rice paddy

loans.name: Phyrek's Group

texts.en:
Phyrek, 31, is married and lives with her husband and one child in a village of the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province. She and her husband are rice farmers and they supplement their family’s income through planting cassava. She has been in this business for six years, earning about 40,000 KHR per day to feed her family. 

Phyrek’s group consists of three members who all are female. She is in her second cycle with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She has successfully repaid the past loan, which has helped her family relieve their financial burden and improve their livelihood. Now requesting another loan with VisionFund, Phyrek, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Yon's Group

texts.en:
Yon is a 61-year-old married mother of five children living in a rural village of the Bovel district, Cambodia. To support her family, Yon has been growing rice and working for others for a fee for 10 years. The current business earns her about 70,000 KHR per day. 
Yon has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely repaid the past loan. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. She is going to use her portion to plow her field. She hopes to make more crops from her current agribusiness.

loans.use: to plow her field

loans.name: Khen's Group

texts.en:
Khen, 51 years old, is married and has 10 kids. She lives with her husband in a rural village of the Bovel district of Battambang province, Cambodia. She earns a living through farming rice and planting corn. They have been in these businesses for 10 years. 
Khen has just joined VisionFund for this cycle. Now leading this group to apply for a loan, Khen, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her family’s income to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es:
Pedro es un joven de 19 años de edad, vive en el Distrito de Huarmey junto a su tía desde hace 9 años ya que sus padres fallecieron cuando él era un niño.
Sin embargo, a pesar de la tristeza por la pérdida de sus seres queridos, él siempre los llevó en su corazón y por eso  siempre buscó salir adelante.
Actualmente Pedro trabaja como ayudante de albañil en distintas zonas de su localidad.
Es un joven muy trabajador, honrado y responsable que con los trabajos que realiza busca ayudar a su tía y poder retribuir toda la ayuda que ella le ha brindado en todos estos años.
Gracias al apoyo que los prestamistas Kiva le han dado a Pedro, él podrá renovar las ventanas y puerta de su habitación para poder protegerse del frío del invierno y así poder descansar bien y salir a trabajar con muchas ganas. Más adelante con esfuerzo y dedicación podrá cumplir su mayor sueño: “Ser empresario Textil”.
texts.en:
Pedro is a young 19 year old man. He has lived in the district of Huarmey with his aunt for nine years because his parents passed away when he was a child. Despite, however, the sadness of losing his loved ones, he carries them with him in his heart and for this reason he seeks to get ahead. Currently Pedro works as a construction worker in several zones of the area. 

He is a very hard-working, honorable, and responsible young man. With his work, he seeks to help out his aunt so that he can return all of the support that she has provided for him over the years. 

Thanks to the support that Kive lenders have given Pedro, he will be able to fix up his windows and the door to his room so that he can be protected from the cold during winter. This will allow him to rest well and leave for work with a great desire. With drive and dedication, in the future he will fulfill his greatest dream: to become a textile business owner.

loans.use: to fix up his windows and door to his room so that he can protect himself from the cold air during winter.

loans.name: Jhan Carlos

texts.es:
Jhan vive en la ciudad de Carhuaz, día a día trabaja con mucho esmero como estibador, brindando el servicio de transporte de carga en zonas de carga de su ciudad, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas, ya que en estos centros de carga se recibe mercadería que proviene de las ciudades de la costa y de esta manera puede tener ingresos para salir adelante.

Jahn esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en la habitación donde vive como refacción de paredes, así mismo solventar algunos gastos personales como compra de alimentos, entre otros , asi jhan podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y poder trabajar y luchar por hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Jhan lives in the city of Carhuaz and works hard every day as a cargo loader, providing a cargo transport service in the loading areas of his city. He works around 10 hours, because in these cargo centres goods arrive from the cities on the coast. This is how he manages to make an income in order to make progress in life. 

Jahn is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since the help he has been given will enable him to carry out improvements to the room where he lives, such as repairing the walls. He will also be able to cover some personal expenses such as buying food and other items. In this way Jahn will be able to improve his quality of life and work hard to make his dream of having his own house a reality.

loans.use: to improve his home by repairing walls, and buy food and other items.

loans.name: Sonia Betty

texts.es:
Sonia esta muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar un horno para cocinar pollo a la braza, de esta manera podrá mejorar a atención a sus clientes y poder tener más platillos para ofrecer a sus clientes.

Sonia vive en la ciudad de Carhuaz, es madre de familia y para poder sacar adelante a su familia Sonia inicio su negocio de venta de comidas típicas desde hace 5 años, el cual va creciendo por el esfuerzo que Sonia tiene ya que su gran sueño es tener un gran restaurante y poder construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en: Sonia is very grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to their help she will be able to buy an oven to cook pollo a la braza ( blackened chicken). In this manner she will improve the service to her customers and have more offerings to serve her customers. Sonia lives in the city of Carhuaz and is the mother of a family. In order to get her family ahead she started her business of selling typical food five years ago. It has been growing due to the efforts Sonia puts in. Her great dream is to own a restaurant and be able to build her house of stolid materials.

loans.use: to buy an oven to make pollo a la braza. (blackened chicken).

loans.name: Stefany Andrea

texts.es: Stefany esta muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como refacción de techo, paredes, entre otros; asimismo podrá solventar algunos gastos personales como compra de enseres para su vivienda, de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguira trabajando en su negocio dedicado a la compra y venta de verduras tales como tomates, cebollas, zanahorias, entre otros desde hace 1 año y seguira esforzándose para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un minimarket”.
texts.en: Stefany is very grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help provided, she will be able to make improvements to her home. Stefany will repair her roof, walls and other parts of her home. She will also be able to cover some personal costs, including buying appliances for her home. This loan will allow Stefany to improve her quality of life. She will continue to work at her business buying and selling vegetables, such as tomatoes, onions and carrots; Stefany has had this business for one year. Stefany will continue to put in the effort to make her great dream - of having a mini-supermarket - a reality.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home, to buy household goods, and more.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es:
María tiene 42 años de edad, estudió solo primer grado por las dificultades económicas que tenía su familia en esa época, ella está casada y es madre de 6 hijos, su esposo se dedica a trabajar como jornalero, sus hijos algunos estudian y otros ya trabajan.

   María solo se dedica a los oficios domésticos, los ingresos los recibe de su hijo mayor que trabaja y de su esposo pues ellos son quienes sostienen económicamente el hogar.

   Elle necesita este crédito para comprar los insumos agrícolas como son: 2 quintales de fórmula, 3 quintales de sulfato y el resto lo ocupará para pagar mano de obra, el crédito le ayudará mucho ya que de otra forma no podría comprar todos los insumos y por lo tanto no supliría parte de los requerimientos nutricionales de dichos cultivos y en cambio comprando los insumos, la producción será mayor y le ayudará a mejorar su situación  económica 
   
Su sueño es ayudar a sus hijas a que se preparen  académicamente y que sean profesionales para que en un futuro gocen de una mejor calidad de vida y puedan ayudar a otros.
texts.en:
María is 42 years old and completed only first grade at school due to the family's financial problems. María is married and a mother to six children; her husband makes a living as a farm labourer. Some of María's children are still in full-time education while others are already working.

María takes care of the household chores. The household income comes from her eldest son and her husband as they support the household.

María needs this loan in order to buy farming supplies: two hundredweights of fertiliser, three hundredweights of sulphate and to pay labourers. This loan will be of great help to María as, without it, she would have no other way of buying these supplies. María needs these supplies as she must meet certain requirements to ensure that crops are healthy; the supplies also ensure greater production and help María to improve her financial situation.

María's dream is to help her daughters as they go through their education. She wants them to have a profession so that, in the future, they may enjoy a higher quality of life and can help others.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies: two hundredweights of fertiliser, three hundredweights of sulphate and to pay labourers.

loans.name: Kimheng's Group

texts.en:
Kimheng is aged 46 years old and married. She lives with her husband and four children in a rural area of the Bovel district of Battambang province. She and her husband are farmers who have been growing corn, cassava and soybean for 15 years. 
Kimheng is the first cycled client with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Kimheng is now leading her group to ask for a loan. She wants to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her business and grow more crops to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Rosa esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales para su negocio de tejido  como lana, palillos de tejer, hilos, entre otros, con lo cual seguirá confeccionando sus chompas, ajuares, entre otros y también algunos materiales para su negocio de venta de tortas; de esta manera podrá atender mejora a sus clientes, mejorara sus ventas y podrá seguir trabajando y luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en: Rosa is grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the help provided, she will be able to buy materials for her knitting business. Rosa will buy wool, knitting needles, threads and more, and this will allow her to continue producing jumpers and other items. Rosa will also use this loan to buy some materials for her cake business, allowing her to offer her customers better service and to increase sales. Rosa will be able to continue working and fighting to make her dream - of building her own home out of strong material - a reality.

loans.use: to buy knitting materials, and utensils for her cake business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy telephone top-up cards and charcoal.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Вот уже 21 год как Валентина занимается бизнесом. Она продает женскую одежду. У нее есть магазин в своем городе, а так же 2 торговых точки в соседних городках.

Валентина хорошо разбирается в своем товаре. У нее есть постоянные покупатели; она ставит умеренне цены и подбирает отличный товар. Валентина хочет пополнить ассортимент женской летней одеждой - платьями, блузами, юбками, брюками, футболками и др. Она делает одну крупную (оптовую) закупку и получает хорошую скидку, т.о. увеличивая свой доход. Валентина просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 30,000 гривен.
texts.en:
For the last 21 years, Valentina has been in business. She sells women's clothes. She has a store in the city and two shops in neighboring towns. 

Valentina understands her products very well. She has regular buyers. She charges a reasonable price and chooses excellent products. Valentina wants to replenish her inventory of women's summer clothes: dresses, blouses, skirts, trousers, T-shirts, etc. She makes one large wholesale purchase and gets a good discount, thus increasing her profit. Valentina is asking for a loan of 30,000 hryvnia.

loans.use: replenish her inventory of women's summer clothes - dresses, blouses, skirts, trousers, T-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Tohir

texts.ru:
Тохир 29-летний молодой человек из города Душанбе, столицы Таджикистана. На протяжении 3 лет он занимается собственным малым бизнесом, в котором ему помогает его старший брат-предприниматель. У Тохира имеется небольшой цех по производству булочек. Он выпекает разные булочки и затем готовую продукцию распределяет по торговым точкам.     
Тохир живет с женой, дочкой и матерью. Он главный в семье и всегда заботится об их благополучии. Сейчас он хочет расширить свой бизнес и увеличить семейный бюджет. Для реализации этой цели он просит кредит в размере 2100 долларов США для купли печей для производства булочек. Этот кредит ему очень важен для расширения бизнеса.
texts.en:
Tohir is a 29-year-old man from Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. For the past three years, he has run his own small business. His older brother helps him. Tohir has a small shop baking buns. He bakes different types of buns and distributes them to retail outlets. 

Tohir lives with his wife, daughter and mother. He is the head of the family and always takes care of their welfare. Now he wants to expand his business and increase the family's income. To achieve this goal, he is requesting a loan of U.S. $ 2,100 to buy ovens for making buns. This loan it is very important for his business expansion.

loans.use: buy a large oven to bake buns.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy food products.

loans.name: Farogatkhon

texts.ru: Фарогатхон работает швеей у себя на дому в Б.Гафуровском районе города Худжанд. Ей 40 лет. Полтора года назад она начала свой бизнес по вышиванию скатертей. У Фарогатхон незаконченное высшее образование и раньше она нигде не работала. Фарогатхон замужем и имеет четверых несовершеннолетних детей, которым по 15, 9, 5 и 1 год. Чтобы помогать мужу обеспечивать большую семью Фарогатхон использовала свое умение на профессиональном поприще. Теперь она занимается шитьем скатертей на продажу. Она шьет на своей старой  машинке. Чтобы улучшить качество шитья Фарогатхон хочет купить оверлок для обрезки и обработки краев ткани при шитье изделий из сыпучих тканей,а также с помощью него она сможет делать плоские швы и цепные строчки, декоративные швы, распошивальные швы и т.д. В связи с этим Фарогатхон обратилась за кредитом в размере 1000 долларов США, чтобы купить этот оверлок и необходимые ткани для шитья. Она очень надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Farogatkhon works as a seamstress in her home in the B. Gafurov district of Khujand. She is 40 years old. Eighteen months ago, she started her business embroidering tablecloths. Farogatkhon started but never completed a university degree, and she has never worked before. Farogatkhon is married and has four young children who are 15, 9, 5 and 1. To help her husband provide for this large family, Farogatkhon uses her skills in business. Now she works sewing tablecloths to sell. She sews on an old machine. To improve the quality of her sewing, Farogatkhon wants to buy a serger for trimming and edging fabric, sewing flat seams and chain stitches, coverstitching seams, etc. Therefore, Farogatkhon requested a loan in the amount of U.S. $1,000 to buy a serger and fabric for sewing. She has high hopes that she will receive support.

loans.use: buy a serger and fabric for making tablecloths.

loans.name: Susetty Pamela

texts.es: Pamela esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá polos, chompas, pantalones, blusas, camisas, entre otros, con lo cual podrá atender de mejor manera a sus clientes en su negocio de venta de ropa y a su vez mejorar sus ventas y su ingresos; de esta manera podrá seguir trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño: “ Estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Pamela is grateful to Kiva lenders as thanks to the help that they have provided her, she will be able to buy polos, sweaters, pants, blouses, and shirts among other items.

With these, she will be able to better attend to her customers in her business selling clothing, and at the same time improve her sales and her earnings. 

In this way, she will be able to continue working and struggling to be able to make her dream a reality: 'To study at university.'

loans.use: to buy merchandise (such as polos, sweaters, pants, blouses, shirts, among other items).

loans.name: Eresvita

texts.es: Eresvita esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo qu ele han brindado ella podrá apoyar a su padre con algunos gastos del hogar, y poder realizar la compra de enseres para la vivienda y gastos de salud; de esta manera podrá ir mejorando la calidad de vida de su padre y seguir trabajando con mucho empeño en su empleo de cocinera para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesion a sus hija y tener una vivienda propia”.
texts.en: Eresvita is grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the support provided, she will be able to support her father as he purchases household appliances and covers healthcare costs. This way Eresvita can improve her father's quality of life and continue working with great determination.
